Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Authorizes David Edwards to receive certain service credit under a twenty-five year retirement plan
Summary: Authorizes David Edwards to receive certain service credit under a twenty-five year retirement plan offering one-sixtieths after twenty-five years of total creditable service for service with the Binghamton Fire Department.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the city of Binghamton to offer an optional retirement plan to firefighter David Edwards
